DOC.brief_summary: Comparison Ovarian reserve marker patient minimal/mild endometriosis patient tubal factor infertility
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Ovarian Reserve Infertile Patients With Endometriosis
DOC.detailed_description: Comparison Ovarian reserve marker ( laboratory u ) patient minimal/mild endometriosis patient tubal factor infertility include : Cycle Day 2 3 FSH E2 , Serum AMH antral follicular count
DOC.criteria: Age 1835 year age . Written sign informed consent patient participate study . Patients regular menses , ovary , serum TSH within normal range , body mass index ( BMI ) < 30 kg/m2 normal sperm analysis husband . Patients previous endocrine disorder . Cases cause infertility endometriosis ( except patient tubal obstruction , control group ) . Patient previous surgery endometriosis .
